wobani.components.light.lightTypes

Interface BlinnPhongLight

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent, Invalidatable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlinnPhongDirectionalLight, BlinnPhongPointLight, BlinnPhongSpotLight
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent, BlinnPhongLightComponent, BlinnPhongPointLightComponent, BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent

    public interface BlinnPhongLight
extends IComponent
    This interface signs that the Component is a Blinn-Phong light source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the ambient color.
      org.joml.Vector3f getDiffuseColor()
      Returns the diffuse color.
      org.joml.Vector3f getSpecularColor()
      Returns the specular color.
